title: Daily Farm Management
text: Efficient combine operation. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We record yields and monitor feed intake. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. We apply rotational grazing protocols for pasture recovery.
